author: Staff Reporter
text:
The 9th edition of the Chennai Bird Race, where large numbers of experienced amateurs and budding birdwatchers spend the day spotting and identifying birds (record as many species of birds as possible) will be held on January 26, Tuesday.

The last date for registration is midnight of 21 January. The registrations can be made through www.blackbuck.org.in.

For details, contact Mr. Sudhakar at 9962515479 and Vijay at Ph: 9840090875
title: Bird race registration to close on Jan. 21
